one question when is this rpg now set

Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:YAY!
 
----- Original Message ----- 
From: Nic 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Friday, July 01, 2005 12:42 PM
Subject: OOC: NPC categories!


Here are the NPC categories and who is responsible of them:

Robo has: The military, the Watchers (with Lord Elder) and one Corrupt
gang.

Airly has: the Bushido predacons (with Lord Spire, who is a woman) and
one mercenary company

Tankor has: civilians, police, and diplomats and government people.

M2KMidi has: the Pacificus Maximals (with lord Perseus), the
industrials, and the traders.

Dark Mouse has: the Silver Wings Maximals (with lord Razorwing), the
Iron Skulls Predacons (with Lord Jotunn), the scientists, and one
Corrupt gang.

Finally, I have the Cyberworld and the Minions with General Vorpal.

You are free to design your major NPCs as you wish, but keep a low
number of these, about two or three by category.

Now playtime everyone!

Role playing games Beast wars Transformers g1 Online role playing games Role playing games online
